Visit Tuesday - Saturday

Always free admission

Open five days per week

Visit Tuesday - Saturday

Open five days per week

Golden history starts here

Golden History Museum

Visit today and meet the Legendary People who built Golden, learn why our local breweries are so famous, and explore Golden’s Epic Events! Admission is always free. Open Tuesday – Saturday, 10 – 4:30. Read more about the History Museum.

Golden History Park

Get a taste of 1800s life at Golden History Park. View the old cabins, check out the Native American Arbor, and take a selfie in front of the one-room schoolhouse. It’s just a block from downtown and admission is free. Read more about Golden History Park.

Contact Us

Golden History Museum & Park
923 10th St., Golden, CO 80401

  • Accessibility Statement
To request reasonable accommodations or report inaccessible content, please fill out our accessibility accommodation form, or contact the City at (303) 384-8000 or at 911 10th Street, Golden, CO 80401. The City of Golden is committed to responding to requests/reports within [2] business days.
